verses.verse: When Jesus <S%G2424><s%> had spoken <S%G2036><s%> these words <S%G5023><s%>, he went forth <S%G1831><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> over <S%G4008><s%> the brook <S%G5493><s%> Kidron <S%G2748><s%>, where <S%G3699><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> a garden <S%G2779><s%>, into <S%G1519><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> he <S%G846><s%> entered <S%G1525><s%>, himself and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> Judas <S%G2455><s%> also <S%G2532><s%>, who <S%G3588><s%> betrayed <S%G3860><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, knew <S%G1492><s%> the place <S%G5117><s%>: for <S%G3754><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> oft-times <S%G4178><s%> resorted <S%G4863><s%> thither <S%G1563><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%>.

Judas <S%G2455><s%> then <S%G3767><s%>, having received <S%G2983><s%> the band <S%G4686><s%> of soldiers <S%G2532><s%>, and officers <S%G5257><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the chief priests <S%G749><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%>, cometh <S%G2064><s%> thither <S%G1563><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> lanterns <S%G5322><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> torches <S%G2985><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> weapons <S%G3696><s%>.

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%>, knowing <S%G1492><s%> all the things <S%G3956><s%> that <S%G3588><s%> were coming <S%G2064><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, went forth <S%G1831><s%>, and saith <S%G2036><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Whom <S%G5101><s%> seek ye <S%G2212><s%>?

They answered <S%G611><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, Jesus <S%G2424><s%> of Nazareth <S%G3480><s%>. Jesus <S%G2424><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> he <S%G1161><s%>. And Judas <S%G2455><s%> also <S%G2532><s%>, who <S%G3588><s%> betrayed <S%G3860><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, was standing <S%G2476><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> them <S%G846><s%>.

When <S%G5613><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> unto them <S%G3754><s%>, I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> he <S%G565><s%>, they went <S%G1519><s%> backward <S%G3694><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> fell <S%G4098><s%> to the ground <S%G5476><s%>.

Again <S%G3825><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> he <S%G1905><s%> asked them <S%G846><s%>, Whom <S%G5101><s%> seek ye <S%G2212><s%>? And <S%G1161><s%> they said <S%G2036><s%>, Jesus <S%G2424><s%> of Nazareth <S%G3480><s%>.

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%>, I told <S%G2036><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> he <S%G1487><s%>; if therefore <S%G3767><s%> ye seek <S%G2212><s%> me <S%G1691><s%>, let <S%G863><s%> these <S%G5128><s%> go their way <S%G5217><s%>:

that <S%G2443><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> might be fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> he spake <S%G3754><s%>, Of <S%G1537><s%> those <S%G846><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> thou hast given <S%G1325><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> I lost <S%G622><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> one <S%G3762><s%>.

Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> a sword <S%G3162><s%> drew <S%G1670><s%> it <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> struck <S%G3817><s%> the high priest <S%G749><s%>'s servant <S%G1401><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> cut off <S%G609><s%> his <S%G846><s%> right <S%G1188><s%> ear <S%G1161><s%>. Now the servant <S%G1401><s%>'s name <S%G3686><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> Malchus <S%G3124><s%>.

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto Peter <S%G4074><s%>, Put up <S%G906><s%> the <S%G4675><s%> sword <S%G3162><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the sheath <S%G2336><s%>: the cup <S%G4221><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> hath given <S%G1325><s%> me <S%G3427><s%>, shall I <S%G846><s%> not3756, 3361 drink <S%G4095><s%> it <S%G846><s%>?

So <S%G3767><s%> the band <S%G4686><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the chief captain <S%G5506><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the officers <S%G5257><s%> of the Jews <S%G2453><s%>, seized <S%G4815><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> bound <S%G1210><s%> him <S%G846><s%>,

and <S%G2532><s%> led <S%G520><s%> him846, Romans to <S%G4314><s%> Annas <S%G452><s%> first <S%G4412><s%>; for <S%G1063><s%> he was <S%G2258><s%> father in law <S%G3995><s%> to Caiaphas <S%G2533><s%>, who <S%G3739><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> high priest <S%G749><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> year <S%G1763><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> Caiaphas <S%G2533><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> he that <S%G3588><s%> gave counsel <S%G4823><s%> to the Jews <S%G2453><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> it was expedient that <S%G4851><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> man <S%G444><s%> should die <S%G622><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> the people <S%G2992><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> followed <S%G190><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> so did another <S%G243><s%> disciple <S%G3101><s%>. Now <S%G1161><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> disciple <S%G3101><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> known <S%G1110><s%> unto the high priest <S%G749><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> entered in with <S%G4897><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the court <S%G833><s%> of the high priest <S%G749><s%>;

but <S%G1161><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> was standing <S%G2476><s%> at <S%G4314><s%> the door <S%G2374><s%> without <S%G1854><s%>. So <S%G3767><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> other <S%G243><s%> disciple <S%G3101><s%>, who <S%G3588><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> known <S%G1110><s%> unto the high priest <S%G749><s%>, went out <S%G1831><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> spake <S%G2036><s%> unto her that kept the door <S%G2377><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> brought in <S%G1521><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%>.

The maid <S%G3814><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> kept the door <S%G2377><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto Peter <S%G4074><s%>, Art1488, 3361 thou <S%G4771><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> one of <S%G1537><s%> this <S%G5127><s%> man <S%G444><s%>'s disciples <S%G3101><s%>? He saith <S%G3004><s%>, I am <S%G1510><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> the servants <S%G1401><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the officers <S%G5257><s%> were standing there <S%G2476><s%>, having made <S%G4160><s%> a fire of coals <S%G439><s%>; for <S%G3754><s%> it was <S%G2258><s%> cold <S%G5592><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> they were warming themselves <S%G2328><s%>: and <S%G1161><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> also <S%G2258><s%> was with <S%G3326><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, standing <S%G2476><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> warming himself <S%G2328><s%>.

The high priest <S%G749><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> asked <S%G2065><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> his <S%G846><s%> teaching <S%G1322><s%>.

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, I <S%G1473><s%> have spoken <S%G2980><s%> openly <S%G3954><s%> to the world <S%G2889><s%>; I <S%G1473><s%> ever <S%G3842><s%> taught <S%G1321><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> synagogues <S%G4864><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the temple <S%G2411><s%>, where <S%G3699><s%> all the Jews <S%G2453><s%> come <S%G3842><s%> together <S%G4905><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> secret <S%G2927><s%> spake <S%G2980><s%> I nothing <S%G3762><s%>.

Why <S%G5101><s%> askest thou <S%G1905><s%> me <S%G3165><s%>? Ask <S%G1905><s%> them that <S%G3588><s%> have heard me <S%G191><s%>, what <S%G5101><s%> I spake <S%G2980><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>: behold <S%G1492><s%>, these <S%G3778><s%> know <S%G1492><s%> the things <S%G3739><s%> which I <S%G1473><s%> said <S%G2036><s%>.

And when <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G846><s%> had <S%G2036><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> this <S%G5023><s%>, one <S%G1520><s%> of the officers <S%G5257><s%> standing by <S%G3936><s%> struck <S%G1325><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> with his hand <S%G4475><s%>, saying <S%G2036><s%>, Answerest thou <S%G611><s%> the high priest <S%G749><s%> so <S%G3779><s%>?

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, If <S%G1487><s%> I have spoken <S%G2980><s%> evil <S%G2560><s%>, bear witness <S%G3140><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> the evil <S%G2556><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> well <S%G2573><s%>, why <S%G5101><s%> smitest thou <S%G1194><s%> me <S%G3165><s%>?
Annas <S%G452><s%> therefore sent <S%G649><s%> him <S%G846><s%> bound <S%G1210><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> Caiaphas <S%G2533><s%> the high priest <S%G749><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> standing <S%G2476><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> warming himself <S%G2328><s%>. They said <S%G2036><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Art1488, 3361 thou <S%G4771><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> one of <S%G1537><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%>? He <S%G1565><s%> denied <S%G720><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%>, I am <S%G1510><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>.

One <S%G1520><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the servants <S%G1401><s%> of the high priest <S%G749><s%>, being <S%G5607><s%> a kinsman <S%G4773><s%> of him whose <S%G3739><s%> ear <S%G5621><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> cut off <S%G609><s%>, saith <S%G3004><s%>, Did <S%G1492><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> see <S%G1492><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the garden <S%G2779><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> him <S%G846><s%>?
Peter <S%G4074><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> denied <S%G720><s%> again <S%G3825><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> straightway <S%G2112><s%> the cock <S%G220><s%> crew <S%G5455><s%>.

They <S%G71><s%> lead Jesus <S%G2424><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Caiaphas <S%G2533><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the Praetorium <S%G4232><s%>: and <S%G1161><s%> it was <S%G2258><s%> early <S%G4405><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> they <S%G1525><s%> themselves <S%G846><s%> entered <S%G1525><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the Praetorium <S%G4232><s%>, that they might <S%G2443><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> be defiled <S%G3392><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> might <S%G2443><s%> eat <S%G5315><s%> the passover <S%G3957><s%>.

Pilate <S%G4091><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> went out <S%G1831><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> saith <S%G2036><s%>, What <S%G5101><s%> accusation <S%G2724><s%> bring ye <S%G5342><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> this <S%G5127><s%> man <S%G444><s%>?

They answered <S%G611><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, If <S%G1487><s%> this man <S%G3778><s%> were <S%G2258><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> an evildoer <S%G2555><s%>, we should <S%G3860><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> have <S%G302><s%> delivered <S%G3860><s%> him <S%G846><s%> up unto thee <S%G4671><s%>.

Pilate <S%G4091><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Take <S%G2983><s%> him <S%G846><s%> yourselves <S%G5210><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> judge <S%G2919><s%> him <S%G846><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> law <S%G3551><s%>. The <S%G3767><s%> Jews <S%G2453><s%> said unto <S%G2036><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, It is <S%G1832><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> lawful for us <S%G2254><s%> to put <S%G615><s%> any man <S%G3762><s%> to death <S%G615><s%>:

that <S%G2443><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> might be fulfilled <S%G4137><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> he spake <S%G2036><s%>, signifying <S%G4591><s%> by what <S%G4169><s%> manner of death <S%G2288><s%> he should <S%G3195><s%> die <S%G599><s%>.

Pilate <S%G4091><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> entered <S%G1525><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the Praetorium <S%G4232><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> called <S%G5455><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Art <S%G1488><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> the King <S%G935><s%> of the Jews <S%G2453><s%>?

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%>, <S%G846><s%> Sayest <S%G3004><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> of <S%G575><s%> thyself <S%G1438><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> did others <S%G243><s%> tell it <S%G2036><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> me <S%G1700><s%>?

Pilate <S%G4091><s%> answered <S%G3385><s%>, Am <S%G1510><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> a Jew <S%G2453><s%>? Thine own <S%G4674><s%> nation <S%G1484><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the chief priests <S%G749><s%> delivered <S%G3860><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%> unto me <S%G1698><s%>: what <S%G5101><s%> hast thou done <S%G4160><s%>?

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%>, My <S%G1699><s%> kingdom <S%G932><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> this <S%G5127><s%> world <S%G2889><s%>: if <S%G1487><s%> my <S%G1699><s%> kingdom <S%G932><s%> were <S%G2258><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> this <S%G5127><s%> world <S%G2889><s%>, then would <S%G302><s%> my <S%G1698><s%> servants <S%G5257><s%> fight <S%G75><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> I should <S%G3860><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> be delivered <S%G3860><s%> to the Jews <S%G2453><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> my <S%G1699><s%> kingdom <S%G932><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> from hence <S%G1782><s%>.

Pilate <S%G4091><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Art <S%G1488><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> a king <S%G935><s%> then <S%G3766><s%>? Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%>, Thou <S%G4771><s%> sayest <S%G3004><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> a king <S%G935><s%>. To <S%G1519><s%> this end <S%G5124><s%> have I <S%G1473><s%> been <S%G1080><s%> born <S%G1080><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> this end <S%G5124><s%> am I <S%G2064><s%> come into <S%G1519><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> I should bear witness <S%G3140><s%> unto the truth <S%G225><s%>. Every one <S%G3956><s%> that is <S%G5607><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the truth <S%G225><s%> heareth <S%G191><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%>.

Pilate <S%G4091><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, What <S%G5101><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> truth <S%G225><s%>? And <S%G2532><s%> when he had said <S%G2036><s%> this <S%G5124><s%>, he went out <S%G1831><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> the Jews <S%G2453><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, I <S%G1473><s%> find <S%G2147><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> crime <S%G156><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> ye have <S%G2076><s%> a custom <S%G4914><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> I should release <S%G630><s%> unto <S%G5213><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> the passover <S%G3957><s%>: will ye <S%G1014><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> that I release <S%G630><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> the King <S%G935><s%> of the Jews <S%G2453><s%>?

They <S%G2905><s%> cried <S%G3956><s%> out therefore <S%G3767><s%> again <S%G3825><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, Not <S%G3361><s%> this man <S%G5126><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> Barabbas <S%G912><s%>. (Now <S%G1161><s%> Barabbas <S%G912><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> a robber <S%G3027><s%>.)
